Just ignore the size tag, seriously order a size up if you're D cup or larger.

评论概述: Body contouring top, surprised by how nice it is!
评论详情: I'm always a bit weary about tops like this from amazon. A lot of times they are a cheap replica of whatever photo is being used. But in this case, I was pleasantly surprised. The material is a stretchy spandex, but still feels extremely smooth and soft, almost like a lulu top. Since it is more affordable than those higher end brands, I think this might rip easily but so far I've had no issues. The padding is sufficient and I don't need to wear a bra with this, it even gives me a bit of a lift which is so nice. The sleeve length is long enough for my arms, I'm 5'7 almost 5'8 and always have an issue finding tops that don't cut off but this one is great! I'll definitely get this in other colors or styles if the brand offers.
